an3.136:1.1: “Mendicants, whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this regularity of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
an3.136:1.3: A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,
an3.136:1.4: then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:
an3.136:1.6: Whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this regularity of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
an3.136:1.8: A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,
an3.136:1.9: then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:
an3.136:1.11: Whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this regularity of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
an3.136:1.13: A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,
an3.136:1.14: then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:
